mean_cn: v.平息，变弱；  v.拆除；使消除危险性，平息
mean_en: to remove the part of (an explosive) that makes it explode :to remove the fuse from (an explosive)
sentence: The lawyer is trying to defuse the tension between husband and wife.
sentence_trans: 这个律师正在竭力平息夫妻双方的紧张局面。
word_etyma: de非，除去+fus流+e名词后缀 → 平息；去掉…的雷管
